# GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/additionalRepositories | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/additionalRepositories ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-additionalrepositories)

-  GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/additionalRepositories 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/additionalRepositories

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-additionalrepositories#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/additionalRepositories
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-additionalrepositories#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-additionalrepositories#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-additionalrepositories#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[CiProductAdditionalRepositoriesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/ciproductadditionalrepositorieslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-additionalrepositories#see-also)

### [Getting Xcode Cloud Products](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-additionalrepositories#Getting-Xcode-Cloud-Products)

[`List All Xcode Cloud Products`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts)Get a list of all products you created in Xcode Cloud.[`Read Xcode Cloud Product Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_)Get information about a specific Xcode Cloud product.[`List All Additional Repositories for an Xcode Cloud Product`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-additionalrepositories)List all additional Git repositories you associated with an Xcode Cloud product.[`Read App Information for an Xcode Cloud Product`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-app)Get the app in App Store Connect thatâ€™s related to an Xcode Cloud product.[`GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-app)[`List All Xcode Cloud Builds for an Xcode Cloud Product`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-buildruns)List all builds Xcode Cloud performed for a specific product.[`GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/buildRuns`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-buildruns)[`List All Primary Git Repositories for an Xcode Cloud Product`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-primaryrepositories)List all primary Git repositories for a specific Xcode Cloud product.[`GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/primaryRepositories`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-primaryrepositories)[`List All Workflows for an Xcode Cloud Product`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-workflows)List all workflows for a specific Xcode Cloud product.[`GET /v1/ciProducts/{id}/relationships/workflows`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciproducts-_id_-relationships-workflows)[`Read the Xcode Cloud Product for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-ciproduct)Get the Xcode Cloud product information for an app you build with Xcode Cloud.
